kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=Create_workout_class, url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{data} = { name="Running Class" | instructor=Charlie Chaplin | description=Come run with Charlie! | start=2022-11-11 | end=2023-08-08 | enable=false }

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/workoutClass/createWorkoutClass path_url=/workoutClass/createWorkoutClass headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '166', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "\\"Running Class\\"", "instructor": "Charlie Chaplin", "description": "Come run with Charlie!", "start": "2022-11-11", "end": "2023-08-08", "enable": "false"}'

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
